item.title: トランプ大統領暗殺未遂事件を受け、「ロジスティクスの問題と状況の変化」を理由に、RNCでの現地取材を中止したデイリー・ショー（Edward Segarra/USA Today）
item.description:
Edward Segarra / USA Today:
The Daily Show scraps its on-the-ground reporting at RNC, citing “logistical issues and the evolving situation”, following the assassination attempt on Trump  —  “The Daily Show” is making some changes to its upcoming coverage of the Republican National Convention.

item.title: 南カリフォルニア・パブリック・ラジオがアレハンドラ・サンタマリアを社長兼CEOに指名、前職はユニビジョン・ロサンゼルスの暫定社長兼GM（Chris Gardner/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Chris Gardner / The Hollywood Reporter:
Southern California Public Radio names Alejandra Santamaria as its president and CEO; she was previously the interim president and GM of Univision Los Angeles  —  The Univision veteran succeeds Herb Scannell in the role after he announced plans to retire last fall.

item.title: 情報筋DAZNはフランスリーグ1の大半の試合の放映権に年間4億ユーロ、カタール傘下のbeINは週1試合に1億ユーロを支払う（『フィナンシャル・タイムズ』紙）。
item.description:
Financial Times:
Sources: DAZN will pay €400M/year for the rights to show the majority of France's Ligue 1 matches, while Qatar-owned beIN will spend €100M for one game per week  —  Accord with DAZN and BeIN helps stave off financial crisis at some clubs but locks in a lower price than first expected

item.title: トランプ暗殺未遂事件の報道を見てみよう。トップネットワークや、誤りや論争のない報道を何時間も提供した報道機関も含まれる（Tom Jones/Poynter）
item.description:
Tom Jones / Poynter:
A look at the coverage of the assassination attempt on Trump, including top networks and outlets providing hours of reporting with no errors or controversies  —  The Associated Press photographer who made the now-famous photo said he never thought about the danger of the moment.  He was too caught up in his job.
